dict.acceptation: 给…装衬垫， 加垫子；填塞；踏平；
垫，衬垫；护具；便签本；发射台；

sent.orig: A simple test that compares blood pressure and legs can be used to screen for PAD.
sent.trans: 筛查PAD方法很简便，就是对比分析受检者上下肢动脉血压。

sent.orig: But legal action against PAD leaders has all but stalled under Mr Abhisit.
sent.trans: 但对PAD领导者采取的诉讼已几乎全被阿坡实搪塞掉。

sent.orig: McAb1A 1 PAD DNR was the most effective in killing U 937 target cells.
sent.trans: Mc Ab1A1 - PAD- DNR偶合物对 U937靶细胞的杀伤作用最强 ，Mc Ab1A1 - DNR次之。

sent.orig: Equally culpable is the royalist PAD that Mr Kasit belongs to.
sent.trans: 甲西所属的保皇主义泰国人民民主联盟(PAD)，也应当受到同样的谴责。

sent.orig: He fared better than his two predecessors, gold wow, who faced protracted PAD protests last year.
sent.trans: 相较于其前两任去年面临持久的PAD抗议者时所为，阿坡实表现良好。
